comment.body: Done.

I just really hate having to make a bunch of accounts with my email everywhere. Using fake emails and not using services that didn't accept them got annoying.
Imageboards work, but they have way too much porn, and some shit I really do not want to see. Although they also have some good discussions.
One of the things I like the most here is that you just need to use the ID, and that's it.
@Ansho Rei: That too. Nowadays most stuff require phones. I don't have one, and wouldn't give the number if i did.
You can't
Did something happen? Wanna talk about it?
We can talk on the synch later if you want to. Or just spend some time.
Why is that so?
In what way?

Who said that these teachings weren't written by him (directly or indirectly, assuming you mean Yahweh), and why would it have hindered science, when all of the basis of science were made by religious people and even institutions?
@cannabisabuser: Would you answer the questions, or do you just like to assume things?
Ay

Then why did you delete the other topic? I see from the notifications you said "the burden of proof is in who makes extraordinary claims".
The burden of proof in on who starts the claims. You started the claim that God doesn't exist, and I made questions about it. The burden is yours.

@cannabisabuser: burden of proof is not about the claim being "extraordinary", it's about being a claim. Are you literally just using what you heard on Cosmos? The only place I ever heard about the claim having to be extraordinary is Cosmos. And no, that's not how it works.
You make a claim, you must defend it. I didn't come and make the claim that God exists, but you did and made the claim that he doesn't.

If you'd accuse me of something in the tribunal, you'd have accusations and you'd have to defend your claims, and then I'd have to defend myself from your claims. This is the burden of proof, the accuser must prove the accused to be wrong, and prove himself to be right, while the accused defends himself.

@cannabisabuser: I wasn't a proper Christian my whole life. I was an edgy atheist commie just like you.
Also, saying that I'm pissed off and not actually giving arguments as to run away from an actual  conversation isn't going to work. If you don't want to talk, just say so.
Careful with the dosage. Smoke is not good for your lungs.
